app_name: Wittle Defender for Android - Free App Download
about_section: Wittle Defender is a casual game developed by Habby. The APK has been available since 7 weeks ago . In the last 30 days, the app was downloaded about 410 thousand times. It's top ranked. It's rated 4.56 out of 5 stars, based on 4 thousand ratings. The last update of the app was on April 19, 2025 . Wittle Defender has a content rating "Everyone" . Wittle Defender has an APK download size of 420.73 MB and the latest version available is 1.1.1 . Wittle Defender is FREE to download.
app_description:
Ready to face the challenge in Wittle Defender? 
 
Step into a dungeon realm where strategy meets surprise! 
 
Welcome to Wittle Defender — a unique mix of tower defense, Roguelike, and card strategy! As the dungeon commander, form a hero squad with varied skills, use odd tactics to defeat monster waves and uncover hidden treasures! 
 
Game Features
- Simple controls, easy gameplay: Enjoy hands-free gaming with auto battle. Sit back and experience true strategic gameplay!
- Immersive dungeon adventures: Experience exquisite, dark-themed visuals from Gloomy Dungeon to the Stormcaller Tower with every frame! 
- Rich hero roster: From Blazing Archer, Thunder Pharaoh to Ice Witch... Choose from nearly a hundred heroes to create your strongest lineup! 
- Strategy meets surprises: Face diverse monsters and unpredictable roguelike skills. Each adventure is a fresh challenge! 
- In-depth strategy: Combine skills and gear to outsmart your enemies. Say no to numerical dominance. Embrace real strategic fun! 
 
Winning or losing is about strategy and choices, not luck! 
Your decisions dictate your fate in Wittle Defender! 
Dive into Wittle Defender & Start your adventure now!
Recent changes:
1. Rune System: Collect and enhance unique Runes!
2. Guild System: Fight with warriors against Guild Boss for resources! 
3. Xenoscape Summon: Xenoscape hero will reshape your strategies in tougher dungeons!
4. Profile: View others' deployed heroes and Treasure setups with one tap.
5. Skin: Ice Witch and Sword Saint skins live!
6. Treasure Update: Powerful new Treasures grant your heroes great abilities.
7. Avatar Frame: Avatar frame live! Don’t miss the limited exclusive frame!
